Name: Dinesh Gundu Rao
Tweet: The whole world is talking about our solar plants..even @LeoDiCaprio endorses. World beating achievement by @CMofKarnataka and @DKShivakumar. @BJP4Karnataka are blind to this..the glare of development is too much for them. #NavaKarnatakaNirmana   https://t.co/AFIz0pmISs
